abstract.para: &cockpit; enables you to perform basic administration of your container images and containers.

topic.para: After the first login to &cockpit;, you need to start &podman;. Keep the default check box selected to start &podman; automatically on each boot.
The Podman containers page enables you to pull images from registries and manage your container. You can also filter the view by entering a filter criterion into the filter field.
